title: Isar Aerospace sets date for second Spectrum launch
description:
German launch company Isar Aerospace is preparing for the second launch of its Spectrum rocket, this time carrying several satellite payloads.

The post Isar Aerospace sets date for second Spectrum launch appeared first on SpaceNews.
